attributes.action: Stop changing the equipment in Plympton parks for unsuitable equipment.
attributes.additional_details: We need 5 emails and a huge amount of people to sign the petition. Then hopefully in the future the council will research and replace equipment more affectively so our children will not be disappointed.
attributes.background: Plympton parents are very concerned that the equipment in our local parks are being replaced by equipment that does not consider the age range of children that use the parks. We love changes and upgrades but would like the council to replace equipment with 'like for like' and age appropriate things.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local parks are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
